tutorialSidebar.label: Module 3: NVIDIA Isaac for Advanced Perception

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the AI-Native Book, where we explore the intersection of artificial intelligence and robotics through the lens of ROS 2 (Robot Operating System 2).

module-1/index.title: Module 1 - The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)
module-1/index.description: Welcome to Module 1 of the AI-Native Book, where we explore ROS 2 as the middleware connecting AI agents to humanoid robots. This module is designed for Python-literate AI/robotics students new to ROS 2.

module-1/ros2-communication.title: ROS 2 Communication Patterns
module-1/ros2-communication.description: Understanding Topics vs Services vs Actions and Python agent control

module-1/ros2-fundamentals.title: ROS 2 Fundamentals
module-1/ros2-fundamentals.description: Introduction to ROS 2 architecture and core concepts

module-1/urdf-modeling.title: URDF Modeling for Humanoid Robots
module-1/urdf-modeling.description: Understanding links, joints, and kinematic chains in robot modeling

module-2/digital-twins-physics.title: Digital Twins & Physics Simulation
module-2/digital-twins-physics.description: Understanding digital twins and physics simulation for humanoid robots

module-2/index.title: Module 2 - Digital Twins & Physics Simulation
module-2/index.description: Welcome to Module 2 of the AI-Native Book, where we explore digital twins and physics-based simulation for humanoid robots. This module is designed for AI/robotics students familiar with ROS 2 basics.

module-2/sensor-simulation.title: Sensor Simulation
module-2/sensor-simulation.description: Simulated sensors (LiDAR, depth cameras, IMUs) and their use for AI training

module-2/simulation-environments.title: Simulation Environments
module-2/simulation-environments.description: Building robot worlds in Gazebo and high-fidelity interaction in Unity

module-3/index.title: Module 3 - NVIDIA Isaac for Advanced Perception
module-3/index.description: Welcome to Module 3 of the AI-Native Book, where we explore NVIDIA Isaac for advanced perception, simulation, and navigation for humanoid robots. This module is designed for AI/robotics students familiar with ROS 2 and simulation concepts.

module-3/isaac-ros.title: Isaac ROS
module-3/isaac-ros.description: Hardware-accelerated perception and VSLAM concepts in the Isaac ecosystem

module-3/isaac-sim.title: NVIDIA Isaac Sim
module-3/isaac-sim.description: Understanding Isaac Sim fundamentals for photorealistic simulation and synthetic data generation

module-3/nav2-humanoid.title: Nav2 for Humanoid Navigation
module-3/nav2-humanoid.description: Path planning fundamentals for humanoid robots and navigation challenges specific to bipedal locomotion

module-4/index.title: Module 4 - Vision-Language-Action Systems
module-4/index.description: Welcome to Module 4 of the AI-Native Book, where we explore Vision-Language-Action (VLA) systems for autonomous humanoid behavior. This module is designed for AI/robotics students familiar with ROS 2, simulation, and navigation concepts.

module-4/voice-to-action.title: Voice-to-Action Systems
module-4/voice-to-action.description: Speech-to-text processing with OpenAI Whisper and translating voice commands into robot intents

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
